A

Action - Class in com.gea.behavior
This is an abstract class that is used to represent an action that you can perform at a specific event.
You can also add and update arguments if the action needs objects to run.
Action(String) - Constructor for class com.gea.behavior.Action
 
addCommand(String, Action) - Method in class com.gea.gui.Drama
Adds a command to Drama instance.
addStoredInformation(String, Object) - Method in class com.gea.gui.Button
Adds a new object to the list of stored information in this button
and makes it associated with the given key
